references.reason: This paper is highly relevant due to its focus on text-to-music generation, a key area of research in the field of symbolic music generation.

references.paper_title: AudioLM: a language modeling approach to audio generation
references.reason: This paper is highly influential because it introduces a novel approach to audio generation using language modeling techniques, an important contribution to the field.

references.paper_title: Music Transformer: Generating music with long-term structure
references.reason: This paper is important as it demonstrates the successful application of the Transformer architecture to symbolic music generation, significantly advancing the field.

references.paper_title: Compound word transformer: Learning to compose full-song music over dynamic directed hypergraphs
references.reason: This paper presents a novel approach to symbolic music representation and generation using compound word transformers, improving both efficiency and expressiveness.

references.paper_title: EMOPIA: A multi-modal pop piano dataset for emotion recognition and emotion-based music generation
references.reason: This paper introduces a large-scale symbolic music dataset annotated with emotion labels, crucial for training and evaluating emotion-conditioned music generation models.
